mapper.select: insert into member (mem_id, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_phone1, mem_phone2, mem_phone3, mem_addr, mem_email1, mem_email2) values (#{mem_id},#{mem_pw},#{mem_name},#{mem_phone1}, #{mem_phone2},#{mem_phone3},#{mem_addr}, #{mem_email1},#{mem_email2})
select mem_name,mem_addr,admin,mem_deposit from member where mem_id=#{mem_id} and mem_pw=#{mem_pw}
update member set mem_deposit=mem_deposit+#{mem_deposit} where mem_id=#{mem_id}
select mem_deposit from member where mem_id=#{login_id}
update member set mem_pw=#{new_pw} where mem_id=#{login_id}
select count(case when admin is null then 1 end ) as memCnt from member

select mem_id, mem_name ,mem_phone1, mem_phone2, mem_phone3, mem_addr, mem_email1, mem_email2 from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from member where admin is null order by mem_name) tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn <=#{endNum}
select count(case when mem_id = #{login_id} then 0 end) as order_cnt from order_goods

select order_seq,bb.menu_name,order_date from(select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from order_goods order by order_seq) tt) aa left outer join (select m.menu_name, c.cart_num from cart c left outer join menu m on m.menu_num = c.menu_num where c.cart_progress='done') bb on aa.cart_num=bb.cart_num where order_seq = #{seq_num}
select order_seq from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from order_goods order by order_seq) tt) aa where rn>=#{startNum} and rn <=#{endNum} order by order_seq
